original: @32a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @32a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: ao d'i y'a na kra m'a r'i tsyee s'a dha nam /
analyzed: ao d'i y'a na kra m'a r'i tsyee s'a dha nam /
translated: Oḍiyāna-kramāryā-marīcicikīrṣā-sādhana

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: au dyan gyi rim pa'i 'od zer can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs /
analyzed: au dyan gyi rim pa'i 'od zer can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs /
translated: 'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs

original: 'phags ma 'od zer can la phyag @32b 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags ma 'od zer can la phyag @32b 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to Ārya-Marīci.

original: dang por snying gar nyi ma'i gdan la h'um ngo //
analyzed: dang por snying gar nyi ma'i gdan la h'um ngo //
translated: First, at the heart, on a sun seat, is hūṃ.

original: de'i 'od zer gyis bcom ldan 'das ma bkug ste /
analyzed: de'i 'od zer gyis bcom ldan 'das ma bkug ste /
translated: Light from that invites the Blessed One.

original: sna tshogs pa'i mchod pas yang dag par mchod la /
analyzed: sna tshogs pa'i mchod pas yang dag par mchod la /
translated: Having made perfect offerings with various offerings,

original: sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byas nas /
analyzed: sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byas nas /
translated: confessing misdeeds, and so forth,

original: stong pa nyid bsgoms ba'i rjes su sna tshogs rdo rje'i rnam pa sems kyis bsams la ;
analyzed: stong pa nyid bsgoms ba'i rjes su sna tshogs rdo rje'i rnam pa sems kyis bsams la ;
translated: after meditating on emptiness, imagine a crossed vajra with the mind.

original: de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang / rdo rje'i ra ba la sogs pa bsams la /
analyzed: de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang / rdo rje'i ra ba la sogs pa bsams la /
translated: From that transforming, imagine a vajra ground, a vajra fence, and so forth.

original: de'i dbus su dpal au dyan gyi gnas gru gsum dkar zhing dmar ba'o //
analyzed: de'i dbus su dpal au dyan gyi gnas gru gsum dkar zhing dmar ba'o //
translated: In the middle of that, the glorious abode of Oḍiyāna is triangular, white, and red.

original: de'i dbus su nyi ma la gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa h'um gis de'i lte ba mtshan pa'o //
analyzed: de'i dbus su nyi ma la gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa h'um gis de'i lte ba mtshan pa'o //
translated: In the middle of that, on a sun, is a five-pronged vajra marked with hūṃ in the center.

original: de yongs su gyur pa las byang chub sems kyi ngo bo nyid 'jig pa'i dus chen po'i se lta bu gyen du rnam par 'phro ba /
analyzed: de yongs su gyur pa las byang chub sems kyi ngo bo nyid 'jig pa'i dus chen po'i se lta bu gyen du rnam par 'phro ba /
translated: That completely transforms into a great, blazing fire of gnosis, the nature of awakened mind, like the fire at the time of the destruction of the world.

original: zil gyis mi non pa'o //
analyzed: zil gyis mi non pa'o //
translated: It is overwhelming.

original: ha ha zhes dgod cing bdud rnam bzhi g-yon brkyang pa'i zhabs kyis mnan pa /
analyzed: ha ha zhes dgod cing bdud rnam bzhi g-yon brkyang pa'i zhabs kyis mnan pa /
translated: Laughing ha ha, he tramples the four māras with his left leg extended.

original: phyag bcu gnyis pa /
analyzed: phyag bcu gnyis pa /
translated: He has twelve arms.

original: zhal drug pa /
analyzed: zhal drug pa /
translated: He has six faces.

original: spyan gsum pa /
analyzed: spyan gsum pa /
translated: He has three eyes.

original: mdog dmar po /
analyzed: mdog dmar po /
translated: He is red in color.

original: dang po g-yas kyi phyag drug rnams su ral gri dang / sna tshogs rdo rje dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang / dgra sta dang / mda' dang / gtun shing bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: dang po g-yas kyi phyag drug rnams su ral gri dang / sna tshogs rdo rje dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang / dgra sta dang / mda' dang / gtun shing bsnams pa'o //
translated: In his first right hands he holds a sword, a vajra cross, a single-pronged vajra, a battle-ax, an arrow, and a club.

original: g-yon gyi phyag rnams su sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i khab dang / rtse gsum dang / mya ngan med pa'i yal ga dang / gzhu dang / zhags pa dang / tshangs pa'i mgo bo rnams so //
analyzed: g-yon gyi phyag rnams su sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i khab dang / rtse gsum dang / mya ngan med pa'i yal ga dang / gzhu dang / zhags pa dang / tshangs pa'i mgo bo rnams so //
translated: In his left hands he holds a needle with a threatening gesture, a trident, an ashoka branch, a bow, a lasso, and a head of Brahmā.

original: mi mgo'i phreng ba 'phyang ba /
analyzed: mi mgo'i phreng ba 'phyang ba /
translated: He wears a garland of human heads.

original: lus kyi yan lag dang / nyid lag thams cad mdzes pa'o //
analyzed: lus kyi yan lag dang / nyid lag thams cad mdzes pa'o //
translated: All the major and minor body parts are beautiful.

original: stag gi pags pa'i stod g-yogs kyi gos can /
analyzed: stag gi pags pa'i stod g-yogs kyi gos can /
translated: She wears a tiger-skin skirt and a garment of human skin.

original: rtsa ba'i zhal ni dmar ba'o //🔽dkar po dang / nag po g-yon pa'i zhal gnyis so //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i zhal ni dmar ba'o // dkar po dang / nag po g-yon pa'i zhal gnyis so //
translated: Her principal face is red.🔽The two left faces are white and black.

original: ser po dang nag po ni g-yas kyi zhal gnyis so //
analyzed: ser po dang nag po ni g-yas kyi zhal gnyis so //
translated: The two right faces are yellow and black.

original: steng gi phag gi zhal ni nag po'o //
analyzed: steng gi phag gi zhal ni nag po'o //
translated: The upper face, that of a pig, is black.

original: ljags 'dril ba /
analyzed: ljags 'dril ba /
translated: She rolls her tongue.

original: skra kham pa gyen du 'bar ba /
analyzed: skra kham pa gyen du 'bar ba /
translated: Her tawny hair bristles upward.

original: rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbu rgyan can /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbu rgyan can /
translated: She has a crown of Vairocana.

original: sprul dang rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: sprul dang rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
translated: She is adorned with ornaments of snakes and bone.

original: gnyug ma'i 'od zer gyis rnam pa thams cad kyi bdud 'joms par byed ma /
analyzed: gnyug ma'i 'od zer gyis rnam pa thams cad kyi bdud 'joms par byed ma /
translated: She has a natural radiance that conquers all forms of Mara.🔽She is surrounded by a retinue of dakinis, bhutas, and vetalas who run in the ten directions, making the terrifying sounds of phemph and ha ha.

original: phyogs bcur 'bros bzhin pa'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / 'byung po dang / ro langs phem phem gyi rnam pa dang / ha ha'i 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i dur khrod brgyad kyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: phyogs bcur 'bros bzhin pa'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / 'byung po dang / ro langs phem phem gyi rnam pa dang / ha ha'i 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i dur khrod brgyad kyis brgyan pa /
translated: She is adorned with the eight charnel grounds.

original: dpal au dyan gyi 'od zer can gyi bdag nyid du skad cig gis bskyed la /
analyzed: dpal au dyan gyi 'od zer can gyi bdag nyid du skad cig gis bskyed la /
translated: In an instant, generate yourself as glorious Uḍḍiyāna Mārajittā.

original: mgo bo dang / mgrin pa dang / snying ga @33a * //
analyzed: mgo bo dang / mgrin pa dang / snying ga @33a * //
translated: the head, the throat, and the heart.🔽🔽

original: rnams su aom a'a:h'um ngo //
analyzed: rnams su aom a'a:h'um ngo //
translated: The head, throat, and heart are marked with oṃ, āḥ, and hūṃ.

original: yan lag thams cad la phat kyi rnam pa bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: yan lag thams cad la phat kyi rnam pa bsam par bya'o //
translated: One should imagine the form of phaṭ on all the limbs.

original: de nas lte ba'i steng du sna tshogs pa'i padma la zla ba nyi ma kha sbyor gyi dbus su h'um gi rnam pa pad snod kyi rang bzhin sna tshogs kyi mdog can gyi yi ge bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas lte ba'i steng du sna tshogs pa'i padma la zla ba nyi ma kha sbyor gyi dbus su h'um gi rnam pa pad snod kyi rang bzhin sna tshogs kyi mdog can gyi yi ge bsam par bya'o //
translated: Then, on top of the navel, on a multicolored lotus, in the center of a sun and moon in union, one should imagine the syllable hūṃ, the nature of a lotus vessel, multicolored, and the nature of the syllable.

original: aom badzra dh'a tv'i shva ri sarba dusht'a na ha na ha na /
analyzed: aom badzra dh'a tv'i shva ri sarba dusht'a na ha na ha na /
translated: oṃ vajra-dhātu-svabhāva-sarva-duṣṭān hā-hā

original: da ha da ha /
analyzed: da ha da ha /
translated: daha-daha

original: pa tsa pa tsa /
analyzed: pa tsa pa tsa /
translated: paca-paca

original: aom m'a r'i tsyee m'am h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom m'a r'i tsyee m'am h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: oṃ māri-cyai māṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā

original: snying po'i sngags so //
analyzed: snying po'i sngags so //
translated: is the essence mantra.🔽oṃ āḥ hūṃ

original: aom a'a:h'um / bsgom pa'i sngags so //
analyzed: aom a'a:h'um / bsgom pa'i sngags so //
translated: is the meditation mantra.

original: aom badzra be t'a l'i h'um phat /
analyzed: aom badzra be t'a l'i h'um phat /
translated: oṃ vajra-vetālī hūṃ phaṭ

original: bzlas pa'i sngags so //
analyzed: bzlas pa'i sngags so //
translated: is the mantra for recitation.🔽oṃ māri-cyai aṃ maṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom m'a r'i tsyee aam mam h'um h'um phat bzlas pa'i sngags gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: aom m'a r'i tsyee aam mam h'um h'um phat bzlas pa'i sngags gnyis pa'o //
translated: is the second mantra for recitation.

original: de nas thun mtshams bzhir gtor ma'i sngags ni /
analyzed: de nas thun mtshams bzhir gtor ma'i sngags ni /
translated: Then, the mantra for the bali offering in the four sessions is:

original: aom a'a ralli ho /
analyzed: aom a'a ralli ho /
translated: Oṃ āralli ho.

original: dza:h'um bam ho:aom badzra d'a ki n'i sa ma ya stv'am dri shya ho /🔽kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi sarba yaksha r'aksha sa bh'u ta pre ta pi sha tson m'a da aa pasm'a ra d'a ki n+y'a da ya: ai dam ba lim grihna th'a pi pa th'a m'a ti kr'a ma th'a ma h'a su kha bi brita dha ye ma ma
analyzed: dza:h'um bam ho:aom badzra d'a ki n'i sa ma ya stv'am dri shya ho / kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi sarba yaksha r'aksha sa bh'u ta pre ta pi sha tson m'a da aa pasm'a ra d'a ki n+y'a da ya: ai dam ba lim grihna th'a pi pa th'a m'a ti kr'a ma th'a ma h'a su kha bi brita dha ye ma ma
translated: Jḥḥ haṃ vaṃ ho. Oṃ vajra-ḍākinī samaya stvaṃ dṛśya ho.

original: sa ha yi ka bha ba th'a h'um h'um phat phat sv'ah'a /🔽zas la sogs pa yang hr'i:'i yi ge 'am /
analyzed: sa ha yi ka bha ba th'a h'um h'um phat phat sv'ah'a / zas la sogs pa yang hr'i:'i yi ge 'am /
translated: Kha kha khāhi khāhi sarva yakṣa-rākṣasa bhūta preta piśāca uṃ māda apasmāra ḍākinya-dārikāṇāṃ idaṃ baliṃ gṛhṇa thā piba thā māta karmātha mahāsukha-vividha-dāya ye mama sahayika bhavathā hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Having purified food and so forth with the syllable hrīḥ,

original: h'um gi yi ge la sogs pas yang dag par sbyangs la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: h'um gi yi ge la sogs pas yang dag par sbyangs la spyad par bya'o //
translated: or with the syllable hūṃ, and so forth, one should enjoy it.

original: au dyan gyi rim pa'i 'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so //
analyzed: au dyan gyi rim pa'i 'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so //
translated: The sādhana of Uḍayanī-Mārīcī is complete.

original: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang / khams pa lo ts'a ba ba ri dge slong gis bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang / khams pa lo ts'a ba ba ri dge slong gis bsgyur ba'o//
translated: It was translated by the paṇḍita Amoghavajra and the Khampa lotsāwa Bari Lotsāwa.
